camera.name: camera
camera.description: My camera. No pictures on it. I use its light to see around me. Hope it doesn't run out of batteries...Î©

frontDoorKey.name: key
frontDoorKey.description: Key to the front door. Hopefully now I can get out of here.

journal.name: journal
journal.description: This is my journal... I read it and remember going to the hospital to confront the doctor... About what though?

batteries.name: batteries
batteries.description: Old batteries... Hope they have some juice left.

patientFile.name: file
patientFile.description: You read the file... Patient is Jessica Smith. Held for mental health examination. Room 103. Door code is ####. The rest is illegible. Maybe her room will have an answer?

bandages.name: bandages
bandages.description: Old Bandages... Hope I won't have to use these.

pressPass.name: press-pass
pressPass.description: This belonged to Jessica S... The picture is of me? I'm Jessica? I need to get out of here.

paperClip.name: paper-clip
paperClip.description: Paper clip. All I need to open simple locks... How do I know this?
